guiSET.core

Class MultilineTextbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.TextBased
        • guiSET.core.Container
          • guiSET.core.VFlowContainer
            • guiSET.core.VScrollContainer
              • guiSET.core.MultilineTextbox

  • public class MultilineTextbox
extends VScrollContainer
    The MultilineTextbox allows entering and pasting multi-line text. If the width of a line exceeds the MultilineTextboxs width, line-breaks are performed. Features copy/paste/cut, select and special events.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen

        public void setKeyPressListener(java.lang.String methodName,
                                java.lang.Object target)
        Set a key listener to the textbox. The event is triggered each time any key is pressed when the textbox has focus. Event arguments: KeyEvent
        Parameters:
        methodName - name of callback method
        target - object that declares callback method.
